> (Cybertron's moons were not rock.  They were like Cybertron, metal.  You
can
> easily tell that from looking at it and when Unicron takes it apart, both
of
> 'em that is.

Ah ok I stand corrected, in the viewing format I have it looks like rock.

 The scale of the Transformers differs with inconsistencies.
> They've been portrayed as being from 20 feet and to 60 or 80 feet,
sometimes
> in the same episode.  Most people I know say they average 20-60 feet
though)
>

True enough however what do you range a normal maximal/predicon to range
from? 5-10 feet MAYBE. (20 feet being the bumble bee sizes/wheelie sizes
which were far from the norm ;) but still compared to bumble bee they'd be
midgets...and i know the cassette bots were smaller still...actually that's
what BW/BM reminds me of...all the transformers have changed into the
cassette transformers !)
